title: Freewheeling Podcast: Understanding the Paralympic cycling categories
content:
Abby calls up former teammate and two-time Paralympic cyclist Greta Neimanas to learn about the upcoming Paralympic Games. For more information check out Matt de Neef’s guide to all the Paralympic cycling categories and events.

     SUBSCRIBE TO THE ‘FREEWHEELING’ PODCAST
Never miss an episode. Subscribe to our ‘Freewheeling’ podcast on iTunes, Spotify,  Google or wherever you get your podcasts.
author: Abby Mickey
